meaning: engrave, cut fine, chop, hash, mince, time, carving

onyomiExamples.meaning: period of time (usu. a period of approx. two hours corresponding to one of the signs of the Chinese zodiac), carving, engraving, cutting, mincing, victory, strictness, cruelty
moment by moment, hour by hour
moment by moment, hour by hour

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to mince, to cut fine, to chop up, to hash, to shred, to carve, to engrave, to chisel, to notch, to tick away (time), to beat out (e.g. rhythm), to record the passing moments, to etch (into one's mind), to remember distinctly, to have tattooed, to torment
